name: Come Into My Life
content: You've got all this love inside
你对于我 意义重大
Come into my life right now
Come into my life right now
Let me touch up your day
Now  I will be a Queen
And you'll put down your sword
看到了我身上的女人样子
Come into my life right now
Come into my life right now
Let me touch up your day
And I will stand by you forever more
I'll be right there  oh yes
I'll be right there  I will
I'll be right there for you
Come into my life right now
For you  I'll be right there
为了你 我就在那里
